'''''A Little Less Shocking Than Love at First Sight''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat 4 opponents with [[Electro-Charged]] within two seconds (5 times).
